title: Chocolate Cheesecake
ingredients: ['170g digestive biscuit crumbs', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '5 tablespoons melted butter', '170g plain chocolate, chopped', '675g cream cheese, softened', '200g caster sugar', '3 eggs', '120ml soured cream', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon sugar', '120ml soured cream']
